attributes.action: not replace Trident which is neither credible as a deterrent nor effective against the real threats to this country ie terrorism
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Replacement of Trident would be a grotesque waste of resources which would be much better spent on supporting conventional defence services as well as the country's infrastructure, carbon reduction and welfare services. It would give no protection against terrorism and it is unimaginable that it would be used, making it an ineffective deterrent. Actual use would be immoral and retention exposes the hypocrisy of preaching non-proliferation to other countries.

rejection.details: This pettion overlaps with several already in existence - http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/search?q=trident
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
